'''Mythcon 22''' was the twenty-second annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Hero Cycle: Archetypes in Fantasy Literature"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' C.J. Cherryh (fantasy author) and Stephen W. Potts (myth and fantasy scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Linda Sundstrom
